ajaxbrowser.verticals module¶

Allow classifying inputs and extending them to all cases in the same domain

ajaxbrowser.verticals.extend(examples)[source]¶

Attempt abstacting these examples from known vertical data. If successful return a list of similar entities else None

ajaxbrowser.verticals.hash_key(value)[source]¶

Define a hash for this value that ignores case

ajaxbrowser.verticals.load_data()[source]¶

Load sample vertical data into a dictionary with a key for each column
